casebody.data:
CHAMBERS
v.
The MOSES H. CONE MEMORIAL HOSPITAL, et al. 147PA18-1 Supreme Court of North Carolina. June 4, 2019 John F. Bloss, Barry L. Kramer, Attorneys at Law, for Chambers, Christopher. Philip J. Mohr, Brent Fancher Powell, Attorneys at Law, for The Moses H. Cone Memorial Hospital, et al. Burton Craige, Carol L. Brooke, Jack Holtzman, Clermont F. Ripley, William R. Corbett, Deborah Goldstein, Narendra K. Ghosh, Attorneys at Law, for N.C. Justice Center, et al. Ryan Y. Park, Deputy Solicitor General, Daniel Wilkes, Assistant Attorney Geneal, Matt Burke, Solicitor General Fellow, for State of North Carolina.

The following order has been entered on the Motion for Extension of Time to File Brief filed on the 3rd of June 2019 by Defendants:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 4th of June 2019."

Defendants shall have up to and including the 10th day of July 2019 to file and serve his/her brief with this Court.
